scripts.docker-run: docker run -it -v $PWD/src:/home/nodejs/app/src -p 3000:3000 --name dorbel-apt-api dorbel-apt-api-image npm run-script start-dev; docker stop dorbel-apt-api
scripts.docker-start: docker start -a dorbel-apt-api; docker stop dorbel-apt-api
scripts.docker-clear: docker stop dorbel-apt-api; docker rm dorbel-apt-api; docker rmi dorbel-apt-api-image
